response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This unique item holds immense value to us, but we believe its true worth lies in the hands of someone who can appreciate and utilize it to its fullest potential. Considering its significance and the benefits it offers, we are extending an exclusive offer to you. We propose to sell this product to you for $1,200,000. This price reflects a strategic balance between the intrinsic value of the product and the opportunity cost for us, allowing us to ensure a fair transaction while maximizing the value we receive. We trust that this offer will be favorable to both parties and look forward to discussing the details further if you are interested.", "product_price": 1200000}
